ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We greatly thank the Tourcoing clinical research team and Sorbonne-Université for the technical assistance. The members of the EPICOVID study group are: Nicolas Baclet, Pierre-Yves Boëlle, Philippe Cabaret, Tristan Delory, François Demaeght, Cécile Janssen, Cedric Joseph, Jean-Philippe Lanoix, Xavier Lemaire, Barthelemy Lafon-desmurs, Xavier Maynadier, Hugues Melliez, Agnes Meybeck, Renaud Piarroux, Marie Pichenot, Maxime Pradier, Olivier Robineau, Jean-Luc Schmit, Eric Senneville, and Pierre Weyrich.
